title: Don't Know You From Adam
itunes:title: Don't Know You From Adam
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
How far would a person go to protect what they loved? 

***

Credited to user EmpyRealInvective. Check out his Amazon page HERE (https://www.amazon.com/s/ref=dp_byline_sr_ebooks_1?ie=UTF8&text=Travis+Kuhlman&search-alias=digital-text&field-author=Travis+Kuhlman&sort=relevancerank)

Narrated by Molly Lankford
